common format in academic world is "First Name" and "Last Name". bibtex also follow this format.

if you want to have complete "Full Name" like "John Doe", or collaboration name like "Global Hypertension Group" in your citation (or reference), adjust your bibtex entry with double "{" symbol

eg

@article{Aad2011150,
title = "TITLE",
author= {{Global Hypertension Group}},
...
}
